mapper.select: SELECT post_Id postId , user_id userId , category, title , createdate , updatedate FROM board_department WHERE department_id = #{departmentId} ORDER BY postId DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board_department(department_id, user_id, category, title, content, hit_count, file) VALUES(#{departmentId}, #{userId}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{hitCount}, #{file})
INSERT INTO board_department_file(post_id, file_name, origin_name, file_size, file_extension) VALUES(#{postId}, #{fileName}, #{originName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileExtension})
mapper.select: SELECT b.post_id postId, b.user_id userId, b.title, b.category, b.content, b.createdate, b.updatedate, u.user_name userName FROM board_department b INNER JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.post_id = #{postId}
